sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form>
      <v-container>
        <v-row>
          <v-col
            cols="6"
            sm="2"
          >
            <v-text-field
              label="search"
        
              persistent-hint
              outlined
            >{{items}}</v-text-field>
          </v-col>
          <v-btn class="mx-1" fab dark small color="cyan" @click="search" >
              search
              </v-btn>
        </v-row>
      </v-container>
    </v-form>
  </template>
  <script>
    export default{
        name: "searchGlobal",
        props:['items'],
        
        data:()=>
        {
return {search:''}
        },
        methods:(()=>
        {
            search(()=>
            {
                this.$emit('search',items)
            })
            

        })
    }
  </script>
